triplets: Spherical objects used in sports, games, or recreation
Playing sports, games, juggling, pet toys, and decorative purposes
Rubber, leather, plastic, foam, vinyl, or fabric
Outer cover, bladder, stitching, and sometimes printed designs
Wide variety depending on sport or design
Varies widely: from ping-pong ball ~4cm to fitness ball ~65cm
Sports equipment companies, toy makers, and manufacturers
Years with proper use and storage, depending on material
